codesample:
%REM
The following code is an abbreviated version of code in CustomGetterTest. Custom Getters are used in serialization - conversion to JSON. This code calls a getName(order as Boolean) function, writing the result to the &quot;name&quot; label in the resulting JSON object.
%END REM
Dim helper as New JsonConversionHelper()
Dim nameGetter as New JsonGetterConverter()
Dim jsonObj as JsonObject

Call nameGetter.forGetter(&quot;getName&quot;).withLiteralParam(true)
Set jsonObj = helper.withCustomConverter(&quot;name, nameGetter)
codesamplehtml: %REM&lt;br /&gt;The following code is an abbreviated version of code in CustomGetterTest. Custom Getters are used in serialization - conversion to JSON. This code calls a getName(order as Boolean) function, writing the result to the &quot;name&quot; label in the resulting JSON object.&lt;br /&gt;%END REM&lt;br /&gt;Dim helper as New JsonConversionHelper()&lt;br /&gt;Dim nameGetter as New JsonGetterConverter()&lt;br /&gt;Dim jsonObj as JsonObject&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Call nameGetter.forGetter(&quot;getName&quot;).withLiteralParam(true)&lt;br /&gt;Set jsonObj = helper.withCustomConverter(&quot;name, nameGetter)

methods.label: deserialize
methods.comment: Overridden function, throws error for that class - getters are only for serialization.
methods.signature: Sub deserialize(holder As JsonConversionHolder, source As JsonObject)
methods.commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Overridden function, throws error for that class - getters are only for serialization.&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
methods.commenthtml: Overridden function, throws error for that class - getters are only for serialization.
methods.inlinecomment: &apos; Overridden function, throws error for that class - getters are only for serialization.

methods.label: forGetter
methods.comment: Passes the getter name to look for in the relevant class
methods.codesample:
%REM
The following code is an abbreviated version of code in CustomGetterTest. Custom Getters are used in serialization - conversion to JSON. This code calls a getName(order as Boolean) function, writing the result to the &quot;name&quot; label in the resulting JSON object.
%END REM
Dim person as New Person(&quot;John&quot;, &quot;Doe&quot;, 42)
Dim helper as New JsonConversionHelper()
Dim nameGetter as New JsonGetterConverter()
Dim jsonObj as JsonObject
Call nameGetter.forGetter(&quot;getName&quot;).withLiteralParam(true)
Set jsonObj = helper.withCustomConverter(&quot;name&quot;, nameGetter).toJson(person)
methods.signature: Function forGetter(getterName As String) As JsonGetterConverter
methods.commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Passes the getter name to look for in the relevant class&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
methods.commenthtml: Passes the getter name to look for in the relevant class
methods.inlinecomment: &apos; Passes the getter name to look for in the relevant class
methods.codesamplehtml: %REM&lt;br /&gt;The following code is an abbreviated version of code in CustomGetterTest. Custom Getters are used in serialization - conversion to JSON. This code calls a getName(order as Boolean) function, writing the result to the &quot;name&quot; label in the resulting JSON object.&lt;br /&gt;%END REM&lt;br /&gt;Dim person as New Person(&quot;John&quot;, &quot;Doe&quot;, 42)&lt;br /&gt;Dim helper as New JsonConversionHelper()&lt;br /&gt;Dim nameGetter as New JsonGetterConverter()&lt;br /&gt;Dim jsonObj as JsonObject&lt;br /&gt;Call nameGetter.forGetter(&quot;getName&quot;).withLiteralParam(true)&lt;br /&gt;Set jsonObj = helper.withCustomConverter(&quot;name&quot;, nameGetter).toJson(person)

methods.label: serialize
methods.codesample:
%REM
Converters are required for every property to be serialized to JSON, because we cannot use reflection to know what properties exist. So this code loops through all converters in the JsonConversionHelper and call their serialize method, which populates the JSON object from the global SamsaraObj, which has already been populated with a VoltScript object (e.g. an instance of a Person class).
The code is an abbreviated version of code in JsonConversionHelper.processObjectToJson()
%END REM
Dim returnObj as New JsonObject()
ForAll converters in Me.converters
    Call converter.serialize(samsaraObj, returnObj)
End ForAll
methods.signature: Sub serialize(source As Variant, target As JsonObject)
methods.codesamplehtml: %REM&lt;br /&gt;Converters are required for every property to be serialized to JSON, because we cannot use reflection to know what properties exist. So this code loops through all converters in the JsonConversionHelper and call their serialize method, which populates the JSON object from the global SamsaraObj, which has already been populated with a VoltScript object (e.g. an instance of a Person class).&lt;br /&gt;The code is an abbreviated version of code in JsonConversionHelper.processObjectToJson()&lt;br /&gt;%END REM&lt;br /&gt;Dim returnObj as New JsonObject()&lt;br /&gt;ForAll converters in Me.converters&lt;br /&gt;    Call converter.serialize(samsaraObj, returnObj)&lt;br /&gt;End ForAll

arguments.label: source
arguments.comment: VoltScript object from which to serialize
arguments.commenthtml: VoltScript object from which to serialize
arguments.inlinecomment: &apos; VoltScript object from which to serialize
